attributes.action: Regulate and make private rental market affordable.
attributes.additional_details:
West berkshire £677.65pcm local housing allowance
Private market £800-1250pcm. Facts of prices from right move.
attributes.background: Private rental costs are extortionate. Working families are forced to move to smaller cramped properties due to not being able to afford the right size housing. Housing benefit is not realistic and should be re considered for today's Market. Rents need regulating.
